<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nocturnal Charm](/Feats.aspx?ID=2344) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The supernatural charm of your vampiric progenitor hangs about you, and you've learned to use it on mortals. Against [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) (or other creatures of your type, if you're not a humanoid), you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47), and to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) and [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50).
name: Nocturnal Charm
